title: Non-algebraizable neighborhoods of curves
authors: Maycol Falla Luza, Frank Loray and Paulo Sad
abstract:
We provide several families of compact complex curves embedded in smooth
complex surfaces such that no neighborhood of the curve can be embedded in an
algebraic surface. Different constructions are proposed, by patching
neighborhoods of curves in projective surfaces, and blowing down exceptional
curves. These constructions generalize examples recently given by S. Lvovski.
One of our non algebraic argument is based on an extension theorem of S.
Ivashkovich.
